tips.capture: Tip: Sets what data source gets saved and restored.
tips.delay: Tip: Delay in fractional seconds before data recall output message to allow system to stablize
tips.file: May be an absolute path or relative to node-red folder (or RED.settings.fileWorkingDirectory if defined), assuming the node-red user has R/W permissions.
tips.keys: Comma delimited list of context keys to be captured/restored. Blank for all.
tips.raw: Treat payload data as raw content (i.e. buffer, default JSON format)
